tv.name: Samsung 75" Q900T 8K Ultra HD HDR Smart QLED TV
tv.description: 8K Infinity Screen - Enjoy edge-to-edge viewing. Black TV bezels are nearly invisible so you can enjoy more of the picture. 8K Resolution - Feel the power of 33 million pixels delivering the ultimate clarity and picture resolution that is four times the resolution of 4K. Object Tracking Sound+ - 6-speaker sound system on the TV creates a realistic cinematic sound experience that tracks the motion in every scene, giving you 3D sound that puts you right in the middle of the action. Direct Full Array 32X - The dynamic tone mapping of HDR 10+ allows you to enjoy rich accurate colours with deep contrast and crisp details. Choose from your favourite voice assistants like Bixby, Amazon Alexa, Google Assistant to Multiple Voice Assistant.
features: Samsung 75 Inches
QLED 8K Technology
240 Hz refresh rate
Connectivity with Bluetooth, RF, Wi-Fi, USB, HDMI, Ethernet (LAN), Digital Audio Out x 1 (Optical)

Cord cutting made easy: Cord cutters can access free, over-the-air HD content thanks to the advanced digital TV tuner with live channel guide or watch live TV from popular cable-replacement services like Sling, Hulu, fuboTV and more.

tv.name: Hisense 40H55G - 40 inch Smart Full HD TV 1080P VIDAA Television, Black
tv.description: Stream movies and TV shows in full HD picture quality. The Hisense H55G uses the VIDAA operating system, which is more than just a user interface. It’s the proprietary OS for Hisense Smart TVs. Originally designed in Canada, it’s fully optimized for each one of our televisions. Game Mode lets you experience pure realism and stay ahead of the game with minimal input lag - which boosts your chances of scoring legendary wins! VIDAA is a fast and simple smart OS that loads quickly and allows you access to some of your favourite apps like Netflix, Amazon Prime Video, Tubi or Facebook Watch. Interact with your Hisense TV in the most natural way possible - by talking. Quickly access entertainment, get answers, and control smart devices around your home—all with just your voice. Blinked and you missed it? Think again. The H55G is built with motion in mind. Motion Rate image processing makes it so you can keep your eye on the ball, chase scene, or multi-player battle. Gamers see lag times drop and viewers see all the key moments in live sports or action movies. Captivating scenes grab your attention – and keep it with smooth motion. DTS Virtual:X technology is a versatile advanced post-processing package that creates an immersive audio experience that includes psychoacoustic bass enhancements and multichannel virtual surround sound. Experience more lifelike, multidimensional audio on your Hisense H55G.
features: TV technology
Product Dimensions: 8.6D x 89.4W x 51.3H Centimetres
Resolution: 1080p
